doc.field: V RM f0904reute b f BC-/GREENSPAN-SAYS-FED-R 10-20 0080
GREENSPAN SAYS FED READY TO PROVIDE LIQUIDITY

The U.S. Federal Reserve is ready to provide liquidity to support the economy and the financial system, Fed Chairman Alan Greenspan said in a statement. The brief statement by Greenspan issued by the Fed said, "the Federal Reserve, consistent with its responsibilities as the nation's central bank, affirmed today its readiness to serve as a source of liquidity to support the economic and financial system." Reuter
